A version of '''[[Minecraft Infdev]]''' was released on '''March 25, 2010''', at 16:40 UTC.<ref name=":0">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(12:41:47) <Notch> flowers that can see the sky will no longer die, but there's still a bug with flowers under trees"</ref>

== Technical ==
'''Performance'''
* Improved performance, however, the game still degrades performance progressively.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Cave generation no longer decreases performance.
* [[Flower]]s exposed to the sky will no longer die.<ref name=":0" />
